languages.text: "Они обеспечат надлежащий уровень загадочности исчезновения, чтобы верующие погрузились в спекуляции о его вознесении и не усердствовали в поисках истины".
"They will see to it that his disappearance is sufficiently mysterious so that the believers delve into speculations about his ascension instead of trying to look for the truth."
languages.original_text: "Они обеспечат надлежащий уровень загадочности исчезновения, чтобы верующие погрузились в спекуляции о его вознесении и не усердствовали в поисках истины".

traits.locale_text: "I'll see to it that his disappearance is sufficiently mysterious so that the believers delve into speculations about his ascension instead of trying to look for the truth."
"I'll see to it that his disappearance is sufficiently mysterious so that the believers delve into speculations about his ascension instead of trying to look for the truth."
"I'll see to it that his disappearance is sufficiently mysterious so that the believers delve into speculations about his ascension instead of trying to look for the truth."
"I'll see to it that his disappearance is sufficiently mysterious so that the believers delve into speculations about his ascension instead of trying to look for the truth."
"They will see to it that his disappearance is sufficiently mysterious so that the believers delve into speculations about his ascension instead of trying to look for the truth."
"They will see to it that his disappearance is sufficiently mysterious so that the believers delve into speculations about his ascension instead of trying to look for the truth."

languages.text: «Se ocuparán de que la desaparición sea lo suficientemente misteriosa como para que los creyentes emprendan debates sobre su ascensión en vez de buscar la verdad».
languages.original_text: "They will see to it that his disappearance is sufficiently mysterious so that the believers delve into speculations about his ascension instead of trying to look for the truth."

traits.locale_text: «Se ocuparán de que la desaparición sea lo suficientemente misteriosa como para que los creyentes emprendan debates sobre su ascensión en vez de buscar la verdad».

languages.text: « Je ferai en sorte que sa disparition soit nimbée de mystère, si bien que ses adeptes croiront en sa possible ascension au lieu de chercher la vérité. »
languages.original_text: "They will see to it that his disappearance is sufficiently mysterious so that the believers delve into speculations about his ascension instead of trying to look for the truth."

traits.locale_text: « Je ferai en sorte que sa disparition soit nimbée de mystère, si bien que ses adeptes croiront en sa possible ascension au lieu de chercher la vérité. »

languages.text: “他们一定会做得天衣无缝，让他的追随者深信这位圣人已经升天而去，不会对他失踪的真相起半点疑心。”
languages.original_text: "They will see to it that his disappearance is sufficiently mysterious so that the believers delve into speculations about his ascension instead of trying to look for the truth."

traits.locale_text: “他们一定会做得天衣无缝，让他的追随者深信这位圣人已经升天而去，不会对他失踪的真相起半点疑心。”

languages.text: 「彼らは、信者が真実を探そうとするのではなく、彼の昇天についての憶測を掘り下げるように、彼の失踪が神秘に満ちたものであることを確かめるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "They will see to it that his disappearance is sufficiently mysterious so that the believers delve into speculations about his ascension instead of trying to look for the truth."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは、信者が真実を探そうとするのではなく、彼の昇天についての憶測を掘り下げるように、彼の失踪が神秘に満ちたものであることを確かめるでしょう」

languages.text: "Sie werden sein Verschwinden derart mysteriös gestalten, dass die Gläubigen über seinen Aufstieg spekulieren, anstatt zu versuchen, die Wahrheit zu ergründen."
languages.original_text: "They will see to it that his disappearance is sufficiently mysterious so that the believers delve into speculations about his ascension instead of trying to look for the truth."

traits.locale_text: "Sie werden sein Verschwinden derart mysteriös gestalten, dass die Gläubigen über seinen Aufstieg spekulieren, anstatt zu versuchen, die Wahrheit zu ergründen."

languages.text: "Ortadan kaybolmasının inandırıcı derecede gizemli olmasını sağlayacaklar. Böylece inananlar, hakikati aramak yerine onun yükselişine dair kurguları kurcalayacak."
languages.original_text: "They will see to it that his disappearance is sufficiently mysterious so that the believers delve into speculations about his ascension instead of trying to look for the truth."
